short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track the schedule of ESAMarathon summer 2022

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The ESA Marathon Summer 2022 is starting soon, and this application is the perfect companion to help you follow the event!
You can:
- access the entire schedule directly from the extension without leaving the stream
- enable notifications to remind you when a game is starting
- search through the schedule to find the games that you want to see
- display the previous played games
- display only the current and upcoming games
- access directly to the donating page
- access directly to the official website by clicking on the icon
- access directly to the website schedule
- open the runner personnal twitch page
- open the ESA stream page by clicking on the twitch icon

New:
- added ability to create custom notifications
- clicking on the notification opens a new tab on the twitch stream
- fixed notification spams
- fixed twitch links on the games
